name: Flash Trainer
description:
Flash Trainer is a game about speedrunning and precision where is no room for luck , only skill.

Your run to finish the obstacle course as you shoot the targets at fast speed.

Controls:

wasdmovespacebarjumpshiftsprint1,2,3...switch levels0main menux reset levelescexitpincrease sensivityodeacrease sensivitymmute/unmute sound

Goodluck and have fun !
